description: Erection of 4-storey building fronting Chingford Mount Road, comprising 43 self-contained flats (13 x 1-bed and 30 x 2-bed), including provision of 26 car parking spaces within undercroft; erection of 4-storey building fronting Titley Close, comprising 11 self-contained flats (8 x 2-bed and 3 x 3-bed), including provision of 9 car parking spaces; erection of a terrace of 7 dwelling houses (2 x 3-bed and 5 x 4-bed) with parking off street, and formation of communal gardens and play area.
